transforms.description: transform specifies a list of transforms on metrics with each transform focusing on one metric.

action.description: Action specifies the action performed on the matched metric. Action specifies if the operations (specified below) are performed on metrics in place (update), on an inserted clone (insert), or on a new combined metric that includes all data points from the set of matching metrics (combine). REQUIRED

aggregation_type.description: AggregationType specifies how to aggregate. REQUIRED only if Action is COMBINE.

group_resource_labels.description: GroupResourceLabels specifies resource labels that will be appended to this group's new ResourceMetrics message REQUIRED only if Action is GROUP

metricincludefilter.description: MetricIncludeFilter is used to select the metric(s) to operate on. REQUIRED

experimental_match_labels.description: MatchLabels specifies the label set against which the metric filter will work. This field is optional.

include.description: Include specifies the metric(s) to operate on.

match_type.description: MatchType determines how the Include string is matched: <strict|regexp>.

new_name.description: NewName specifies the name of the new metric when inserting or updating. REQUIRED only if Action is INSERT.

operations.description: Operations contains a list of operations that will be performed on the resulting metric(s).

action.description: Action specifies the action performed for this operation. REQUIRED

aggregated_values.description: AggregatedValues is a list of label values to aggregate away.

experimental_scale.description: Scale is a scalar to multiply the values with.

label.description: Label identifies the exact label to operate on.

label_set.description: LabelSet is a list of labels to keep. All other labels are aggregated based on the AggregationType.

label_value.description: LabelValue identifies the exact label value to operate on

new_label.description: NewLabel determines the name to rename the identified label to.

new_value.description: NewValue is used to set a new label value either when the operation is `AggregatedValues` or `addLabel`.

value_actions.description: ValueActions is a list of renaming actions for label values.

new_value.description: NewValue specifies the label value to rename to.

value.description: Value specifies the current label value.

submatch_case.description: SubmatchCase specifies what case to use for label values created from regexp submatches.
